props.emptyText: Text shown when there is no more content to load.
props.loadMoreText: Text shown in default load more button, when in manual mode.
props.margin: Value sent to the intersection observer. Will make the observer trigger earlier, by the margin (px) value supplied.
props.mode: Specifies if content should load automatically when scrolling (**intersect**) or manually (**manual**).
props.side: Specifies the side where new content should appear. Either the **start**, **end**, or **both** sides.

slots.load-more: Shown when scrolled to either side of the content, in manual mode.

events.load: Emitted when reaching the start / end threshold, or if triggered when using manual mode.
